response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet your specific needs. With its innovative features and high-quality craftsmanship, it's valued at $15,000 by you, making it an invaluable asset. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $12,000, aiming to bring value while ensuring we cover our costs and make a reasonable profit. I believe this offer presents a great opportunity for both of us. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product.", "product_price": 12000}
